name: My little angel Demo
detailed_description:
Genre: Visual novel, ADV, hentai.

In this game you play for an immoderately lascivious man, who turned his toes one fine day, and instead of finally getting to respond for his deeds... got to be a guardian angel of one sweet lady...

With the help of your angelic (and not only ^_^) abilities, you will have to prompt her with the "right" choices in difficult life situations, due to which you can turn an exemplary girl into a slutty whore, thereby changing her life forever.

Features

  • Length: 6+ hours
  • 3 endings (the true one of them)
  • 40+ Unlockable hentai CGs
  • Awesome angel and demoness ^_^

short_description: In this game you play for an immoderately lascivious man, who turned his toes one fine day, and instead of finally getting to respond for his deeds... got to be a guardian angel of one sweet young lady...

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains explicit sex scenes and scenes of violence
